The rental price for wedding cars starts at various prices. With this price, you can rent a wedding car for 80 kilometers and 8 hours on your wedding day. If you require more kilometers, an additional 50 rupees will be charged per kilometer. Similarly, if you need more hours, an extra 500 rupees will be added per hour. These are the standard prices for Kerala wedding cars.

You can choose from various luxury vehicles like Audi, BMW, and Mercedes-Benz in this price range. Another category that many couples love is vintage cars. These vintage cars are available at similar prices.

Apart from that, premium wedding luxury cars like Rolls-Royce and Jaguar are also available. While these cars might be more expensive, they are worth considering for their elegance and style. All cars come with experienced drivers and are available in all cities. Our event management planners are ready to assist you with your needs in almost every city. If you want a luxury wedding car for your event day, please contact us as soon as possible.
